name: Can You Survive? Escape From The Military Depot #2
name_original: Can You Survive? Escape From The Military Depot #2
description:
Can You Survive? Escape From The Military Depot #1 is the Third Game of a Survivor Horror Games Series, Developed by Bruno Araujo in Muion Games Studio (an Indie Studio From Brazil)... Can You Survive? it's a very simple and good game made for you that like fps and zombie games!

This is The First Scenario of the Depot!
